trans-unit.source: Defines the pre-defined types of rights that can be associated with a <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 定義可以與 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim" /> 物件相關聯之預先定義的權限型別。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that specifies that the right represents an identity.
trans-unit.target: 取得字串，該字串指定權限表示識別 (Identity)。

trans-unit.source: The right that represents an identity.
The string that is returned by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.Rights.Identity%2A> property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/right/Identity.
In general, a typical <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet> has one claim with the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.Rights.Identity%2A> right.
trans-unit.target: 一般來說，一般的 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet> 有一個具有 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.Rights.Identity%2A> 權限的宣告。

trans-unit.source: This claim represents the identity of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet>.
trans-unit.target: 此宣告表示 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet> 的識別。

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet> has a SID claim that represents the user's SID.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet> 具有表示使用者 SID 的 SID 宣告。

trans-unit.source: Likewise, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.X509CertificateClaimSet> has a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimTypes.Thumbprint%2A> claim that represents the identity that is associated with an X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，<xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.X509CertificateClaimSet> 具有 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimTypes.Thumbprint%2A> 表示與 X.509 憑證相關聯之識別的宣告。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that specifies that the right represents a property that the entity associated with a claim possesses.
trans-unit.target: 取得字串，該字串指定此權限表示與宣告相關聯之實體擁有的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The right that represents a property that the entity associated with a <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim" /> object possesses.
trans-unit.target: 此權限表示與 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim" /> 物件相關聯之實體擁有的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The string that is returned by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.Rights.PossessProperty%2A> property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/right/PossessProperty.

A claim of type <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimTypes.Name%2A> with right <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.Rights.PossessProperty%2A> over the value `Martin` indicates that the entity with which such a claim is associated possesses a `Name` property with the value `Martin`.
trans-unit.target: 具有權限 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimTypes.Name%2A> 高於值 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.Rights.PossessProperty%2A> 之型別 `Martin` 的宣告，表示與該宣告相關聯的實體擁有一個具有值 `Name` 的 `Martin` 屬性。
